roleset.name: cause to know

example.name: inform-v: inform an SBAR
example.text: But a much smaller mutual fund company, the USAA Investment Management Co. unit of USAA, San Antonio, Texas, said it informednine national brokerage firms that it will cease business with themunless they stop index-arbitrage trading.
example.arg: that it will cease business with themunless they stop index-arbitrage trading.

example.name: inform-v: inform a wh-clause
example.text: One source familiar with the airline said, however, that Mr. Corr wasn't informed in advance during the summer when Mr. Lorenzo began discussions with potential buyers.
example.arg: when Mr. Lorenzo began discussions with potential buyers.

example.name: inform-v: inform of
example.text: During his tenure, Mr. Corr attempted through a series ofmeetings to inform managers of some of the company'sfuture plans, traveled widely to talk to employees and backedtraining sessions designed to improve the carrier's image.
example.arg: managers of some of the company'sfuture plans,

example.name: inform-v: inform about
example.text: New York authorities, informed yesterday aboutthe move, reacted with concern and even some anger to the idea ofthe nation's third-largest corporation leaving without giving theman opportunity to accommodate it.

example.text: This patient is well informed from her own research.

example.name: informed-j: with arg 2
example.text: Patient is well informed as to the nature of the procedure
example.arg: as to the nature of the procedure

example.name: informative-j
example.text: ...and Pythagoras' Theorem really is informative about surveyed triangles etc., just as Hooke's Law or Boyle's Law isinformative about everyday elastic substances or gases.
example.arg: just as Hooke's Law or Boyle's Law isinformative about everyday elastic substances or gases.
